Title: Requires 10% of the penalties imposed by the superintendent of financial services to be deposited in the community development financial institution fund
Summary: Requires 10% of the penalties imposed by the superintendent of financial services to be deposited in the community development financial institution fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง44, Bank L; amd ยง109, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the insurance law, in relation to dedicating ten percent of the fines and penalties imposed by the superintendent of financial services for deposit into the community development financial institution fund
